Start.Text: Welcome to the choose your own adventure tutorial!  You find yourself standing before two doors leading to separate hallways.  Which door would you like to go through?  To begin, /choose an option from the menu.  Have fun!

1.Text: I'd like to go through the left door, please.

2.Text: I'd like to go through the right door, please.

BranchA.Text: The hall is green, this must be a good sign!  There is an exit sign at the end of the hallway.

BranchB.Text: The hall is red, this isn't good sign!  There is an exit sign at the end of the hallway.

BranchB2.Text: It looks like walking down the hall turned it green.  Maybe your position caused the room to change color?  I'm not weird.  You're the one imagining a color chaning room.

MergeAB.Text: You find yourself in a room with a small CRT.  The screen reads "CONGRATULATIONS ON FINISHING THE TUTORIAL".  Odd, I didn't know we were in a tutorial?
